pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference About the Standardized Mortality Ratio when Evaluating the Effect of a Screening Program on Survival // Functions to make inference about the standardized mortality ratio (SMR) when evaluating the effect of a screening program. The package is based on methods described in Sasieni (2003) doi: 10.1097/00001648-200301000-00026 and Talbot et al. (2011) doi: 10.1002/sim.4334.
